title: Installation Guide
storageRequirement: At least 2GB of free storage space
downloadDescription: Download the latest version of Pok√©mon Infinite Fusion from the official GitHub repository.
extractDescription: Extract the downloaded ZIP file to a location of your choice. Make sure you have enough disk space.
runDescription: Double-click the Game.exe file (Windows) or Game.app (Mac) to start the game.

faq1.question: The game won't start. What should I do?
faq1.answer: Make sure you have the latest version of the game and that your system meets the minimum requirements. Try running the game as administrator if you're on Windows.

faq2.question: How do I update the game?
faq2.answer: Download the latest version from the official GitHub repository and replace your existing game files. Make sure to backup your save files first.

faq3.question: Where are my save files located?
faq3.answer: Save files are typically located in the 'Save' folder within your game directory. Make sure to backup this folder before updating the game.
